channel.title: ELK on Linuxkai 的博客
channel.description: Recent content in ELK on Linuxkai 的博客

item.title: ELK安装
item.description: 配置yum源 elasticsearch [elasticsearch] name=Elasticsearch repository for 7.x packages baseurl=https://artifacts.elastic.co/packages/7.x/yum gpgcheck=1 gpgkey=https://artifacts.elastic.co/GPG-KEY-elasticsearch enabled=0 autorefresh=1 type=rpm-md kibana [kibana-7.x] name=Kibana repository for 7.x packages baseurl=https://artifacts.elastic.co/packages/7.x/yum gpgcheck=1 gpgkey=https://artifacts.elastic.co/GPG-KEY-elasticsearch enabled=1 autorefresh=1 type=rpm-md logstash [logstash-7.x] name=Elastic repository for 7.x packages baseurl=https://artifacts.elastic.co/packages/7.x/yum gpgcheck=1 gpgkey=https://artifacts.elastic.co/GPG-KEY-elasticsearch enabled=1 autorefresh=1 type=rpm-md 安装 sudo yum install elasticsearch sudo yum install kibana sudo yum install logstash 启动 systemctl start elasticsearch systemctl start kibana systemctl start logstash docker 安装 使用官方docker 仓库 注：使用官方的，比较慢，老是超
